title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.37 - Abandoned vehicles-disposition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.37 - Abandoned vehicles-disposition

State Regulations

Any such vehicle not claimed by the owner thereof at the
expiration of 30 days shall be disposed of by the Port Authority in the manner
provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.37

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
